## Steps to get started

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# optionally write default settings into your R profile
usethis::edit_r_profile()
usethis::edit_r_environ()

# 1) create this project
usethis::create_package("/Projects/Packages/RgitDemo")

# 2) create this vignette
usethis::use_vignette("Quickstart_R_package_on_gitHub")

# 3) initialize git
usethis::use_github()

# 4) create your first function
usethis::use_r("utils_list.R")
```
